'''Shoghi Cervantes''' is a member of [[Mojang Studios]]. Before working on Minecraft, they<ref>https://bsky.app/profile/shoghi.rocks</ref> worked on (and are the founder of) [http://www.pocketmine.net/ PocketMine], which is a server software for {{BE}}.

They currently work for the team of development for {{BE}} and formerly worked on {{MCD}} when it was in development.<ref>{{tweet|shoghicp|558538887505907712}}</ref>

== Trivia ==

*They are red-green colorblind.<ref>https://twitter.com/shoghicp/status/591625376323002369</ref><ref>https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jSJ8zZu4Jc4&t=6m44s</ref>
*A [[splash]] in Pocket Edition is titled "Blame shogchips!", referencing a joke site which allowed users to 'blame' Shoghi.<ref>https://twitter.com/shoghicp/status/588665039000707072</ref>
